message.content:
cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SD

This paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning) as it deals with the training of deep probabilistic models. It could also belong to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) as deep Boltzmann machines are a type of neural network. Additionally, it could be categorized under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as deep learning is a popular area of research in AI. The paper also mentions the use of the DBM for image recognition, which could place it under cs.CV (Computer Vision). Finally, the regularization technique used in the paper could be relevant to the sub-category of cs.SD (Software Engineering) as it involves improving the training process of a machine learning model.
